entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to a few flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
